properties.name: flowable.modeler.app.data-source-prefix
properties.description: The prefix for the database tables.

properties.name: flowable.modeler.app.decision-table-migration-enabled
properties.description: Enables the logic to migrate old decision table models to the new model version

properties.name: flowable.modeler.app.deployment-api-url
properties.description: The root URI to the REST services of the Flowable engine, used by the Flowable Modeler application to deploy the application definition BAR file to the engine. Default url for the Flowable Task application is http://localhost:8080/flowable-task/app-api

properties.name: flowable.modeler.app.rest-enabled
properties.description: Enables the REST API (this is not the REST api used by the UI, but an api that's available over basic auth authentication).
